item.title: 1RG
item.description: https://1rg.space/ 1RG invites individuals, teams and organizations who value community care, creativity and innovation to work and play in a space that promotes collaboration and curiosity.

item.title: Atelier 8 18
item.description: http://www.kylabourgh.com/atelier-818.html Curated and exhibited art shows in an exclusive home studio. Follow on IG @atelier8.18

item.title: coFood Collaborative Garden
item.description: Garden venue space at East 4th and Scotia stewarded by [[coFood Vancouver]]. ![[cofoodyvr_welcome.jpg]] Welcome signs for [[coFood Vancouver]] and [[Living Systems Network]]

item.title: Notional Space
item.description: A community space that is also the home of Mark & Yoo-Mi in East Vancouver. This is where we live.

item.title: Red Gate Arts Society
item.description: Not for Profit DIY Music and Art Space Red Gate TV Youtube @redgateartssociety Red Gate TV Broadcast schedule Mastodon Server Red gate operates a [[Mastodon]] server at https://redgate.

item.title: The Permanent
item.description: The physical headquarters of [[Internet Archive Canada]]. 330 West Pender Street in Downtown Vancouver, just a block from the DCTRL hackerspace.
